record.title: PERMISSION TO OFFER AMENDMENT NO. 10 AT ANY TIME DURING FURTHER CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 3915
record.narrative:
PERMISSION TO OFFER AMENDMENT NO. 10 AT ANY TIME DURING FURTHER CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 3915 -- (House of Representatives - November 15, 2007)

[Page: H14018]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that during further consideration of H.R. 3915 in the Committee of the Whole, pursuant to House Resolution 825, amendment No. 10 be permitted to be offered at any time.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Massachusetts?
